title: A president increasingly out of touch: Trump has lost his political superpower, polls show
description: Americans have long seen anger and attitude from Trump. What’s different now is that the politician who could once detect and shape the public zeitgeist now appears out of touch — cloistered, flanked by the elite and motivated by naked self-interest.
content: How low can President Donald Trump go? One answer is his Thanksgiving Day social media screed, trashing America as divided, disrupted, carved up, murdered, beaten, mugged, and laughed at, because of … [+4208 chars]
